column4: mwe,hm in the ieee80211 directory the command sudo make patch_kernel works,but doesnt find the files wich are in the in-tree location.when i sudo make patch_kernel in the in-tree directory i get   make: *** No rule to make target `patch_kernel'.  Stop.
you will need apt-get install build-essentials as well
